Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Central/Irving Park
ShortDescription: 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Irving Park, Austin, Addison, and Central, due to street blockage near Central/Irving Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Irving Park, Austin, Addison, and Central, due to street blockage near Central/Irving Park.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Fullerton
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red  Line trains are standing at Fullerton due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red  Line trains are standing at Fullerton due to a mechanical problem on a train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
